text:
Ali Abedi () is an Iranian football player who currently plays for the Iranian football club Malavan in the Iran Pro League.
Malavan.
He started his career with Malavan youth levels. He promoted to first team by Nosrat Irandoost in summer 2014. He made his debut for Malavan in 2014–15 Iran Pro League against Sepahan as a substitute for Reza Etemadi.
